Package org.apache.avro.reflect

Use Java reflection to generate schemas and protocols for existing classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ReflectData Utilities to use existing Java classes and interfaces via reflection.
ReflectData.AllowNull ReflectData implementation that permits null field values.
ReflectDatumReader DatumReader for existing classes via Java reflection.
ReflectDatumWriter DatumWriter for existing classes via Java reflection.
ReflectRequestor A Requestor for existing interfaces via Java reflection.
ReflectResponder Responder for existing interfaces via Java reflection.
 

Annotation Types Summary
FixedSize Declares the size of implementations of GenericFixed.
 

Package org.apache.avro.reflect Description

Use Java reflection to generate schemas and protocols for existing classes.
